_meanings:
{@--3@} Any
systematically arranged collection
of texts or verses.

{@--4@} A 
compendium or compilation of laws, code,
digest; {#manusaMhitA#}.

{@--5@} The 
continuous hymnical text of the Veda as
formed out of the Padas or 
individual words by proper phonetic
changes according to different 
Śākhās or schools; {#padaprakftiH sahitA#}
<ls>Nir.</ls>

{@--7@} The Supreme Being who hold 

and supports the universe.

the continuous text of the
Veda (<ab>opp.</ab> {#padapAWa#} <ab>q. v.</ab>).
